item.title: Git Configuration
item.description: Because I am using nvim as git different tool, following configuration is required. [user] email = guangzong@pitt.edu name = Guangzong Chen [merge] tool = vimdiff [mergetool] keepBackup = false [mergetool "vimdiff"] cmd = nvim -d $LOCAL $REMOTE $MERGED -c '$wincmd w' -c 'wincmd J' [diff] tool = vimdiff [difftool] keepBackup = false [difftool "vimdiff"] cmd = nvim -d $LOCAL $REMOTE -c '$wincmd w'
